vulnerability_findings.name: use-multiple-require
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(accrualBlockNumber == 0 && borrowIndex == 0, "market may only be initialized once");
vulnerability_findings.message: Using multiple require statements is cheaper than using && multiple check combinations. There are more advantages, such as easier to read code and better coverage reports.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-short-revert-string
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(msg.sender == admin, "only admin may initialize the market");
vulnerability_findings.message: Shortening revert strings to fit in 32 bytes will decrease gas costs for deployment and  gas costs when the revert condition has been met.

vulnerability_findings.name: compound-borrowfresh-reentrancy
vulnerability_findings.message: Function borrowFresh() in Compound performs state update after doTransferOut()

vulnerability_findings.name: compound-sweeptoken-not-restricted
vulnerability_findings.message: Function sweepToken is allowed to be called by anyone

vulnerability_findings.name: erc20-interface
vulnerability_findings.message:
EIP20NonStandardInterface (RBep20Immutable.sol#117-179) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (RBep20Immutable.sol#143)
	-transferFrom (RBep20Immutable.sol#157)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in RToken._addReservesInternal (RBep20Immutable.sol#2456-2468):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (RBep20Immutable.sol#2457-2458)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalReserves (RBep20Immutable.sol#2464-2465)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in RToken._reduceReserves (RBep20Immutable.sol#2519-2529):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (RBep20Immutable.sol#2520-2521)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalReserves (RBep20Immutable.sol#2526-2527)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in RToken._setCointroller (RBep20Immutable.sol#2388-2407):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(newCointroller.isCointroller(),marker method returned false) (RBep20Immutable.sol#2396-2397)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- cointroller (RBep20Immutable.sol#2399-2400)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in RToken._setInterestRateModel (RBep20Immutable.sol#2584-2594):

	- error = accrueInterest() (RBep20Immutable.sol#2585-2586)
	- _setInterestRateModelFresh(newInterestRateModel) (RBep20Immutable.sol#2591-2592)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- interestRateModel (RBep20Immutable.sol#2591-2592)

Reentrancy in RToken._setInterestRateModelFresh (RBep20Immutable.sol#2600-2630):

vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in RToken.accrueInterest (RBep20Immutable.sol#1614-1692):
	External calls:
	- borrowRateMantissa = interestRateModel.getBorrowRate(cashPrior,borrowsPrior,reservesPrior) (RBep20Immutable.sol#1631)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accrualBlockNumber (RBep20Immutable.sol#1683)
	- borrowIndex (RBep20Immutable.sol#1684)
	- totalBorrows (RBep20Immutable.sol#1685)
	- totalReserves (RBep20Immutable.sol#1686)

vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in RToken.borrowInternal (RBep20Immutable.sol#1945-1953):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (RBep20Immutable.sol#1946)
	- borrowFresh(msg.sender,borrowAmount) (RBep20Immutable.sol#1952)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalBorrows (RBep20Immutable.sol#1952)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth

Reentrancy in RBep20Immutable.constructor (RBep20Immutable.sol#2896-2913):
	External calls:
	- initialize(underlying_,cointroller_,interestRateModel_,initialExchangeRateMantissa_,name_,symbol_,decimals_) (RBep20Immutable.sol#2908-2910)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- admin (RBep20Immutable.sol#2911-2912)

vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in RToken.liquidateBorrowInternal (RBep20Immutable.sol#2160-2175):

	- totalSupply (RBep20Immutable.sol#1927)

vulnerability_findings.name: unused-return
vulnerability_findings.message:
RBep20.initialize (RBep20Immutable.sol#2686-2701) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-EIP20Interface(underlying).totalSupply() (RBep20Immutable.sol#2698-2699)

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: (MathError err, Exp memory fraction) = divScalarByExp(scalar, divisor);
vulnerability_findings.message:
Exponential.divScalarByExpTruncate.fraction (local variable @ RBep20Immutable.sol#1105) shadows:
	- ExponentialNoError.fraction (function @ RBep20Immutable.sol#977-979)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in RToken.borrowFresh (RBep20Immutable.sol#1968-2032):
	External calls:
	- allowed = cointroller.borrowAllowed(address(this),borrower,borrowAmount) (RBep20Immutable.sol#1970)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accountBorrows (RBep20Immutable.sol#2020)
	- accountBorrows (RBep20Immutable.sol#2021)
	- totalBorrows (RBep20Immutable.sol#2022)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in RToken.initialize (RBep20Immutable.sol#1255-1286):

	- err = _setCointroller(cointroller_) (RBep20Immutable.sol#1269)
	- err = _setInterestRateModelFresh(interestRateModel_) (RBep20Immutable.sol#1277)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _notEntered (RBep20Immutable.sol#1285)
	- decimals (RBep20Immutable.sol#1282)
	- name (RBep20Immutable.sol#1280)
	- symbol (RBep20Immutable.sol#1281)

	State variables written after the call(s):
	- underlying (RBep20Immutable.sol#2697-2698)
